head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERBUSSE, EDWARD JOSEPH, S.J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERBUSSE, EDWARD JOSEPH, S.J.

block.p: BERBUSSE-Edward Joseph, S.J. Beloved brother of William of Palm Beach, Florida; Adele Ziegelmeier of Connecticut and sister Barbara of White Plains, New York. Reposing at the Jesuit Community Chapel at Murray-Weigel Hall, 515 E. Fordham Road. Visitation Friday. Mass of Christian Burial, Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, Saturday, 11:30 AM. For information contact Farenga Bros. Inc., Directors: 718-654-0500.
